content:
That's a great idea about providing enrichment activities for the goats. I'll definitely look into that. I've noticed they do get bored sometimes and start chewing on things they shouldn't, so maybe some toys or puzzle feeders would help keep them occupied. 

By the way, I've been meaning to ask - do you have any recommendations for a good fencing material for the pigpen? I've been thinking about adding some extra insulation or pads to the fence to make it safer for Porky.
